html:
6.12.19  8:09 pm   if you had a reality show what would it be named

     https://billwurtz.com/reality

6.12.19  7:23 pm   Will there ever be another episode of wfaoie?

     only if i can get James Earl Jones signed on

6.12.19  7:18 pm   do you know anyone named Bill?

     i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no, the people i was thinking of are all celebrities and i haven't met them

6.12.19  6:44 pm   When are you going to upload more vlogs?!?!?!?!???

     every friday

6.12.19  5:46 pm   How often do you get lost in a dark forest

     every fuckin time

6.12.19  5:11 pm   AAAAAA!!! DON'T YOU SOMETIMES FEEL LIKE A MILLION BUCKS BECAUSE YOU'VE DISCOVERED SOMETHING ENTIRELY NEW AND INTERESTING, LIKE IT JUST BLOWS YOUR MIND!!!

     yes

      IT'S WEIRD, BECAUSE IT'S ALWAYS BEEN THERE, BUT I'VE NEVER NOTICED IT UNTIL NOW. I'M SO HAPPY AND EXCITED RIGHT NOW, I HAVEN'T FELT LIKE THIS IN A LONG TIME!! WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU'VE DISCOVERED SOMETHING AMAZING AND MIND BLOWING, IF I MAY ASK?

     this entire past month, mostly

6.12.19  4:45 pm   Will you ever do a behind-the-scenes of the questions page?

     yes

6.12.19  4:00 pm   What's sarcasm

     sounds like a type of bread. warmly crisped,

6.12.19  3:57 pm   Are you working on other videos during this time (another frollic perhaps?)

     not yet

      or just a really big music video?

     a normal sized music video

6.12.19  3:38 pm   What is the greatest threat against humanity?

     a threatening sort of mindset

     yes

     i mostly do them on here

     sort of

      do you actually like this sort of thing?

     maybe

6.12.19  1:58 pm   radishes or turnips?

     tradishnips

6.12.19  1:47 pm   Have Putin won European Elections?

     could have switched with dmitri again

6.12.19  1:38 pm   How you making a living from this?

     i have generous sponsorships from [Your Brand Here], [Your Brand Here], and [Your Brand Here]

6.12.19  1:29 pm   is your job honorable?

     i was going to say no, but now that i think about it yes

6.12.19  1:16 pm   Do you enjoy podcasts?

     yes

      What're you into?

     it would be cool to cast my own pod sometime

6.12.19  12:36 pm   my head hurts what should i do

     make a list of all the things you are gonna do when your head doesn't hurt. also seek medical attention if it's worse than what you're accustomed to

6.12.19  12:15 pm   why did you do the genius interview?

     to check out the glorious and copious amounts of yellow they have in their studio

6.12.19  11:40 am   Will everything be okay Bill?

     yes, and also better and worse

6.12.19  9:14 am   Hey, I'm in Japan for a week, what should I do?

     business, pleasure, and so forth

6.12.19  7:30 am   whats the best way to improve on editing without getting feedback as all the constructive criticism I've been getting recently is about as useful as a paper mache bomb shelter

     it doesn't really matter how much feedback you get. all you gotta do is keep doing the job, more and more over and over. you get better each time. you will find yourself saying "hey, this one is way better than the one i did 5 things ago". you will find yourself saying that again and again

6.12.19  6:43 am   seeing that you still answer here gives the impression that you maybe aren't dead. Or an alien hivemind superspecies answers all these. Are you an alien hivemind superspecies?

     i thought you were

6.12.19  6:02 am   i'm too stressed to sleep, what should i do?

     how about some mathematics

6.12.19  3:47 am   thoughts on worms?,

     too short

6.12.19  3:07 am   Are Andy Warhol's videos an inspiration for your video/editing style?

     not sure, i haven't seen them

6.12.19  2:57 am   so on 2 years from now I have to make a weird school project where I have to investigate or analyze anything related to science, math, or arts, including songs. Other students have told me that the weirder the project, the higher the grade. Is there a deep and significant meaning behind your song called "hello sexy pants" that I can analyze, or am I just wasting my brain cells on looking for an explanation? Are your songs even made to be analyzed?
P.S. Its for SCIENCE!! 

     you're the analyst. you gotta know that if you're gonna be the analyst

6.12.19  1:43 am   What is a time when someone helped you with something hard?

     my mom helped me get born

6.12.19  12:45 am   do you get tired of people asking when is the new video?

     no it makes me feel newly awakened inside, with a fresh sense of vitality and wonder

6.11.19  11:40 pm   oops existed, now what

     do a book tour!

6.11.19  11:21 pm   how the heck does quality work?

     the content is evaluated by the inspector. the inspector decides what quality to say it is

6.11.19  8:41 pm   have you actually gone skydiving

     not even close

6.11.19  8:29 pm   WHAT ARE YOU DOING SPENDING ALL THIS TIME ON VIDEOS WHEN YOU SHOULD BE CRANKING OUT NEW MUSIC ALL THE TIME AND TOURING THE WORLD?!?! (sorry for yelling at you)

     that's nice of you but please stop

6.11.19  5:36 pm   have you ever gone a month without sleeping

     no

6.11.19  4:39 pm   Purpose of life?

     convert everything to rounded edges, and then just when no one expects go back to square edges. then switch again unexpectedly

6.11.19  3:49 pm   what software do you use for editing and creating your videos?

      [Your Brand Here] ad space available

6.11.19  3:37 pm   I've been listening to your jazz + songs (the ones w/out video) and they're amazing. I realize it is a good business decision to do the video with the music, but dude... you can't do this forever unless you're really happy with it. I mean, you can, but keeping up with making the videos to go with the music is going to slow down the whole songwriting process, yes?

     the songwriting process actually goes very quickly, and happens entirely before anything is produced

     I don't know what you will do - keep it as is (the old 2 week schedule), change it up a bit, do away with it entirely. But I can say that if I were in your shoes, with the same fire in my veins and the same passionate drive for songwriting, I would drop the videos.

     ah but have you considered if you had the same passionate drive i do for videos

      Or, at the very least, alternate between music with no video, and music with video.

I really can't speak for you, but from what I can see, you seem to want to complete multiple lifetimes worth of work! If that's the case, you've gotta be quick :)

6.11.19  3:26 pm   Do you believe in magic?

     it's ok

6.11.19  2:42 pm   What would you do in a zombie apocalypse situation? 

     immediately begin selling zombie apocalypse merchandise

6.11.19  2:21 pm   i'm scared of being homeless and i'm doing very little from stopping myself from being homeless right now. do you have any tips and tricks for trying not to be homeless?

     there must be 100 ways. but you might have to become slightly more scared before you start truly considering all those ways

6.11.19  2:14 pm   hi. I've seen you recommend light exercise before. could you give me an example of what works for you?

     walking?

      also, what's the objective with the exercise again

     it's like when you have a moving device (a device that moves, one of it's best features is the movability aspect). would be nice to move the thing once in a while

6.11.19  2:07 pm   if you prefer to make a new favorite song, does that mean that every song you release is your favorite for a short time?

     it is aimed to be

6.11.19  1:43 pm   If a television producer approached you about making a television show about you, would you be into it?

     what the heck is a television

6.11.19  1:17 pm   why are our lives so short. this sucks.

     our lives are almost the longest of anyone, and we definitely have the craziest powers

      who designed this game?

     you, i think

      do you think we can ask the devs to give lifespan a buff

     yes

6.11.19  12:33 pm   Do you like the taste of plastic

     no

6.11.19  12:16 pm   can you reincarnate backwards in time

     no that would be pre incarnate

     must let the melody come up with me

6.11.19  11:45 am   Hey can be assured that the video for the song will be so Crazy that I can forgive you for taking 30 millennia?

     no
